Beautifully decorated, clean and well equipped apartment. All we need was in place. Available towels, hair dryer, cosmetics, Ironing facilities. Kitchen toaster, dishwasher, coffee machine, glassware bottles, even spices, oil, sugar, coffee and tea. In the living room a large TV with a wide range of software and comfortable sofas. The bedroom is the tale. Clean, beautiful bed linen and comfortable large beds.
